thread.title: Nassar cries after victim asks for an apology

title: Nassar cries after victim asks for an apology
text:
Nassar cries after victim asks for an apology 1:41am GMT - 01:46 
Eighteen-year-old Emily Morales said she wanted to forgive the former MSU doctor Larry Nassar and asked that he apologize to her. Nassar, who is being sentenced this week after pleading guilty to additional counts of criminal sexual conduct related to allegations he assaulted girls under the guise of medical treatment, cried in court. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
